metadata.title: CVE-2020-13302 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions before 13.1.10, 13.2.8and 13.3.4. Under certain conditions GitLab was not properly revoking usersessions and allowed a malicious user to access a user account with an oldpassword.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
